mapper.select: SELECT c.course_id, c.title, c.description, c.duration, c.price, COALESCE(AVG(cr.rating), 0) as rating, c.author_id, c.preview_image, c.created_at, CASE WHEN c.status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as is_public, COUNT(DISTINCT cs.step_id) as restaurant_count, 0 as like_count, '🎓' as icon FROM courses c LEFT JOIN course_reviews cr ON c.course_id = cr.course_id LEFT JOIN course_steps cs ON c.course_id = cs.course_id WHERE c.author_id = #{authorId} GROUP BY c.course_id, c.title, c.description, c.duration, c.price, c.author_id, c.preview_image, c.created_at, c.status ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT c.course_id, c.title, c.description, c.duration, c.price, COALESCE(AVG(cr.rating), 0) as rating, c.author_id, c.preview_image, c.created_at, CASE WHEN c.status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as is_public, COUNT(DISTINCT cs.step_id) as restaurant_count, 0 as like_count, '🎓' as icon FROM courses c LEFT JOIN course_reviews cr ON c.course_id = cr.course_id LEFT JOIN course_steps cs ON c.course_id = cs.course_id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId} GROUP BY c.course_id, c.title, c.description, c.duration, c.price, c.author_id, c.preview_image, c.created_at, c.status
mapper.update: UPDATE courses SET status = CASE WHEN status = 'ACTIVE' THEN 'PENDING' ELSE 'ACTIVE' END WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
